message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out on this amazing deal!
Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in your product, but my budget is $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $150?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to meet you at $150. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $165. This is my final compromise, so I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $165 is still too high for me. I'm happy to pay $140 for this product. This is the most I can afford, and I hope you'll consider it.

I understand that $140 is your maximum budget, Bob. I appreciate your honesty. However, I still need to make a profit, and $140 is below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $165, which would be $152.50. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit.
